<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment/#aebf48160a3995325c6d2465080bcab68adcbefeedb7422d13473a4df6ff1cf964">MCFragment::FT&#95;PseudoProbe</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MCPseudoProbeAddrFragment&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>).getContents().size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment/#aebf48160a3995325c6d2465080bcab68acd75963af411400a2ed7c133a25d17a3">MCFragment::FT&#95;Dummy</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should not have been added&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;invalid fragment kind&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compute the amount of padding required before the fragment \\p F to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// obey bundling restrictions, where \\p FOffset is the fragment&#39;s offset in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// its section and \\p FSize is the fragment&#39;s size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346" lineLink="#a186e69494dfd4a377b1d48f7c85d78b4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="#a186e69494dfd4a377b1d48f7c85d78b4">computeBundlePadding</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BundleSize,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcencodedfragment">MCEncodedFragment</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                     uint64&#95;t FOffset, uint64&#95;t FSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OffsetInBundle = FOffset &amp; (BundleSize - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t EndOfFragment = OffsetInBundle + FSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are two kinds of bundling restrictions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1) For alignToBundleEnd(), add padding to ensure that the fragment will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#42;end&#42; on a bundle boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2) Otherwise, check if the fragment would cross a bundle boundary. If it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    would, add padding until the end of the bundle so that the fragment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    will start in a new one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;alignToBundleEnd()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Three possibilities here:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A) The fragment just happens to end at a bundle boundary, so we&#39;re good.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B) The fragment ends before the current bundle boundary: pad it just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    enough to reach the boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C) The fragment ends after the current bundle boundary: pad it until it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    reaches the end of the next bundle boundary.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: this code could be made shorter with some modulo trickery, but it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// intentionally kept in its more explicit form for simplicity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EndOfFragment == BundleSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (EndOfFragment &lt; BundleSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BundleSize - EndOfFragment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EndOfFragment &gt; BundleSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 2 &#42; BundleSize - EndOfFragment;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OffsetInBundle &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; EndOfFragment &gt; BundleSize)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BundleSize - OffsetInBundle;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler/#a7fd3ef6690dbde3a5840707d439b5a22"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler/#a7fd3ef6690dbde3a5840707d439b5a22">MCAssembler::layoutBundle</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42;Prev, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfragment">MCFragment</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If bundling is enabled and this fragment has instructions in it, it has to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// obey the bundling restrictions. With padding, we&#39;ll have:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        BundlePadding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//             |||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Prev  |##########|       F        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    ^</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                    F-&gt;Offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The fragment&#39;s offset will point to after the padding, and its computed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// size won&#39;t include the padding.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;.align N&quot; is an example of a directive that introduces multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fragments. We could add a special case to handle &quot;.align N&quot; by emitting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// within-fragment padding (which would produce less padding when N is less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the bundle size), but for now we don&#39;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
